languages.text: {n}Авель скашивает взгляд на вас, и оцепенение, сковавшее его тело, улетучивается.{/n} "В этой точке Цикл разомкнулся и превратился в восходящую спираль, как измыслил Амарнат".
{n}Abel looks sideways at you, and at once his transfixed stupor is gone.{/n} "At this point in time, the Cycle has been broken and reshaped into a rising spiral, as Amarnat envisioned."
languages.original_text: {n}Авель скашивает взгляд на вас, и оцепенение, сковавшее его тело, улетучивается.{/n} "В этой точке Цикл разомкнулся и превратился в восходящую спираль, как измыслил Амарнат".

traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}アベルがあなたを横目で見たとたん、呆然としていたはずの彼は放心状態から覚めた。{/n}「現時点で、アマルナトが想定していた通り、サイクルは破壊され、上向きの螺旋へと形を変えました」
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks sideways at you, and at once his transfixed stupor is gone.{/n} "At this point in time, the Cycle has been broken and reshaped into a rising spiral, as Amarnat envisioned."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルがあなたを横目で見たとたん、呆然としていたはずの彼は放心状態から覚めた。{/n}「現時点で、アマルナトが想定していた通り、サイクルは破壊され、上向きの螺旋へと形を変えました」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯斜着眼看了你一眼，脸上的呆滞与麻木之色立刻消失不见。{/n}“在这个时间点上，循环已经被打破，重新塑造成了上升的螺旋，正如阿玛纳特所设想的那样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks sideways at you, and at once his transfixed stupor is gone.{/n} "At this point in time, the Cycle has been broken and reshaped into a rising spiral, as Amarnat envisioned."

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯斜着眼看了你一眼，脸上的呆滞与麻木之色立刻消失不见。{/n}“在这个时间点上，循环已经被打破，重新塑造成了上升的螺旋，正如阿玛纳特所设想的那样。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel sieht dich schief an, und seine Benommenheit schwindet sofort.{/n} "Zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt ist der Zyklus durchbrochen und wurde zu einer sich erhebenden Spirale umgeformt, wie Amarnat es sich vorgestellt hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks sideways at you, and at once his transfixed stupor is gone.{/n} "At this point in time, the Cycle has been broken and reshaped into a rising spiral, as Amarnat envisioned."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel sieht dich schief an, und seine Benommenheit schwindet sofort.{/n} "Zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt ist der Zyklus durchbrochen und wurde zu einer sich erhebenden Spirale umgeformt, wie Amarnat es sich vorgestellt hat."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel vous adresse un regard oblique et sort aussitôt de sa torpeur subjuguée.{/n} « À ce stade, le cycle a été brisé et transformé en spirale ascendante, conformément à la vision d'Amarnat. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks sideways at you, and at once his transfixed stupor is gone.{/n} "At this point in time, the Cycle has been broken and reshaped into a rising spiral, as Amarnat envisioned."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel vous adresse un regard oblique et sort aussitôt de sa torpeur subjuguée.{/n} « À ce stade, le cycle a été brisé et transformé en spirale ascendante, conformément à la vision d'Amarnat. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel te mira de reojo, y el estupor de su mirada desaparece enseguida.{/n} «En estos momentos, el Ciclo se ha interrumpido y reformado como una espiral ascendente, tal y como Amarnat predijo».
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks sideways at you, and at once his transfixed stupor is gone.{/n} "At this point in time, the Cycle has been broken and reshaped into a rising spiral, as Amarnat envisioned."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel te mira de reojo, y el estupor de su mirada desaparece enseguida.{/n} «En estos momentos, el Ciclo se ha interrumpido y reformado como una espiral ascendente, tal y como Amarnat predijo».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel sana göz ucuyla bakıyor. Donakalmış, kendinden geçmiş hâli o an ortadan kalkıyor.{/n} "Döngü, zamanın bu anında kırıldı ve yükselen bir sarmal şeklini aldı. Tıpkı Amarnat'ın öngördüğü gibi."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks sideways at you, and at once his transfixed stupor is gone.{/n} "At this point in time, the Cycle has been broken and reshaped into a rising spiral, as Amarnat envisioned."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel gözünün kenarından sana bakıyor ve donakalmış ve kendinden geçmiş hâli anında ortadan kalkıyor.{/n} "Döngü, zamanın bu anında kırıldı ve yükselen bir spiral şeklini aldı. Tıpkı Amarnat'ın öngördüğü gibi."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
